item.description:
Hey there,

The sea monsters are at precinct every sunday night and they get better every week.

We've posted the sea monsters' sunday night gig here many times now, but we're going to continue to post it until we get it right and everyone in eastern massachusetts has seen this band at least once.

As usual this is a joint meetup with the 'Fun with Alcohol!' group.

Come on out and dance the night away to the sea monsters' amazing music.

Plus remember, monday is a holiday. No need to get up early for work!
item.how_to_find_us: i look more or less like my profile pic. i'll also send a cell # at about 8p.
item.name: Sea Monsters @ Precinct
